name: Social Beat
overview:
Social Beat is a new age digital media firm with expertise in content marketing, social media marketing, search engine marketing, web development and integrated digital marketing.

We have vast experience in leveraging social media for your business and ensuring desired results are achieved through social media. Social Beat can create a community for your brand and connect with potential customers online on blogs and social media platforms.

Search Engine Optimisation & Content Marketing is crucial for any business and we have used our expertise to achieve results for our clients. You can see the blog of one of our clients at www.koolkart.com/buzz Social Beat can help you build earch engines as an attractive customer acquisition channel.

We can built a wide range of website - right from simple 10 page websites to ecommerce websites with over 10,000 products. We have experience in using content management system platforms like Wordpress, Weebly, Magento, Joomla and the like to build high quality websites with amazing user experienced.

Though our core expertise is in digital marketing, it cannot be isolted from the offline branding or PR. We recommend an integrated marketing approach along with our preferred brand & PR consultants.
